TextLibrary.Text: Red-Axe
Mmmm... I sense a power about you, though you fight like a one-armed, headless, half-blind Gnoll.
Mmmm... I sense a power about you, though you fight like a one-armed, headless, half-blind Gnoll.
Mmmm... I sense a power about you, though you fight like a one-armed, headless, half-blind Gnoll.
Mmmm... I sense a power about you, though you fight like a one-armed, headless, half-blind Gnoll.
Then you'll train me?
Then you'll train me?
Then you'll train me?
Then you'll train me?
Yes, I will train you. I will set you a series of tasks - each one will teach you more about the axe.
Yes, I will train you. I will set you a series of tasks - each one will teach you more about the axe.
Yes, I will train you. I will set you a series of tasks - each one will teach you more about the axe.
Yes, I will train you. I will set you a series of tasks - each one will teach you more about the axe.
Thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you.
Thank you.
Hmph! You will not thank me by the time we're done.
Hmph! You will not thank me by the time we're done.
